title.value: BIOS problems / keyboard cannot be used during boot

body.value:
In seldom cases the BIOS will be reseted during deleting of the system. Or older laptops do not support internal and/or external USB keyboards during the boot process.
It might happen that you are not able to use the arrow keys (up, down, right, left), even you need them to reconfigure the BIOS. In such cases the USB control (and sometimes the internal keyboard) was deactivated.
A possible solution: Connect an external PS/2 or USB keyboard, continue to install or adjust the BIOS.
At www.bios-info.de you can find further informations.
